_source.short_desc: Motivosity is an employee engagement platform that helps people be more motivated at work.
_source.long_desc: Motivosity is a modern employee engagement software with the mission to make people happier at work. Our platform focuses on three of the top drivers of employee satisfaction: feeling appreciated for your work, being part of a community, and having a meaningful relationship with your manager. With an average 95% user engagement rate, our software drives amazing results by making consistent recognition a part of your culture and making visible all the great work your team members are doing.
_source.pricing_details:
Motivosity's four products work together to create the full suite your company needs for employee engagement, or perfectly on their own. With zero startup costs or integration fees, no matter what product you are using.

Connect       FREE
Recognize   $4 per user per month
Lead             $5 per user per month
Listen           $2 per user per month

With bundle and volume discounts available.

media.caption: Motivosity's public social feed of Recognition and Highlights. See all the great things happening in your company. Like, comment and create a connected workplace.
Celebrate birthdays and work anniversaries! Plus as admin you can attach a dollar amount to send for each milestone, and allow the employee to choose exactly how they want to be rewarded.
Bring the human aspect to work! Get to know coworkers wherever they are with personality profiles, interest groups, personality types with similarities and differences comparisons, and more!
No more annual engagement surveys! Increase your eNPS, and know how your teams are doing with regular quick eNPS surveys that pop up in a platform everyone is already using.
Send an appreciation, attach a company value and a dollar or two. Mobile app or desktop accessible so anyone can say thanks!

category_features.name: Ad hoc Reporting
category_features.definition: Generate reports that meet information requirement, as the occasion requires

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Key Performance Indicators
category_features.definition: Important metrics on which company is evaluated

category_features.name: Predictive Analytics
category_features.definition: Predict future data based on historical data sets

category_features.name: Strategic Planning
category_features.definition: At a high level, visualize a preferred outcome, define goals and identify specific steps to achieve them

related_products.short_desc: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that drives rep productivity on the world's #1 CRM platform.
related_products.features: Drive growth with Sales Cloud 360, the best-in-class sales solution that has helped power the world's best sales teams on the world's #1 CRM platform. Firms of all sizes, industries, and geographies, realize value faster with Sales Cloud 360. Increase rep productivity with data driven selling by quickly deploying industry-specific apps and best practice processes.  You also get access to 150,000+ sales organizations and a 2 million user-strong community that are passionate about sales growth.

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is a business performance management software with customized reports, resource management, portfolio management, and more.
related_products.features: Wrike is a business performance management software trusted by 20,000+ companies worldwide. Optimize your business using customized reports, resource management and allocation, Gantt charts, time-tracking reports, portfolio management, and workload overviews all in one place that can be shared company-wide, or with external stakeholders. Integrate Wrike with 400+ applications to automate your everyday tasks. Reduce the need for emails, meetings, status updates with company-wide visibility.

related_products.short_desc: NetSuite, the world's #1 cloud ERP, gives you the visibility and control you need to make smart decisions and grow with confidence.
related_products.features: NetSuite is an all-in-one cloud business management solution that helps more than 32,000 organizations operate more effectively by automating core processes and providing real-time visibility into operational and financial performance. With a single, integrated suite of applications for managing accounting, order processing, inventory management, production, and supply chain and warehouse operations, NetSuite gives companies clear visibility of their information and control of their business.

related_products.short_desc: 15Five is a people and performance platform that instantly upgrades each and every manager.
related_products.features: 15Five is a people and performance platform that instantly upgrades each and every manager. It works by combining employee engagement, continuous performance management, and manager effectiveness software with education, services, and community. At the heart of our approach is Best-Self Management, an evidence-inspired strategy for cultivating world-class managers and transforming organizations by unlocking every employee's potential.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Online Advanced (Save 50%) is a cloud-based, all-in-one, accounting and business hub solution, designed for growing, small to mid-sized businesses. Get performance reporting with highly customizable tracking tools, automated workflows, and real-time revenue and cash flow management dashboards. Seamlessly integrate best-in-class Premium Apps like Salesforce and HubSpot (CRM), Bill.com (accounts payable), DocuSign, LeanLaw & more to expand your capabilities as your business needs grow.

related_products.short_desc:
Everything you need to manage contracts, clients, proposals, contracts, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.
related_products.features:
Business performance management for independent professionals-that's HoneyBook.

HoneyBook makes it easy to book more clients, manage projects, and get paid all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

related_products.short_desc: Sisense delivers rapid, full-scale analytics on large and scattered datasets and allows for easy exploration of complex data.
related_products.features:
Sisense is the only business intelligence software that makes it easy for users to prepare, analyze and visualize complex data. Sisense provides an end-to-end solution for tackling growing data sets from multiple sources, that comes out-of-the-box with the ability to crunch terabytes of data and support thousands of users--all on a single commodity server.

Sisense has already won over the hearts of some of the worlds leading, most data-intensive companies, including eBay, Henry Schein, NASA

related_products.short_desc: Complete, out-of-the-box-desktop accounting software, with secure cloud and mobile access, for small & medium sized businesses.
related_products.features: Sage 50cloud Accounting (formerly Peachtree Software) is a comprehensive accounting solution for small business. Designed for security, compliance and cloud-connected productivity. Popular features include detailed profitability tracking, cash flow forecasting, customized reporting via Microsoft Excel, advanced inventory tracking and automated bank reconciliation.

related_products.short_desc: CallSource is the industry leader for the most accurate call scoring using live call analysts who listen to your calls.
related_products.features: Do you want to get more appointments from the same amount of phone calls? CallSource offers businesses call handling performance management solutions so you can improve your results. By listening to phone calls, our team of live human analysts with the highest accuracy in the industry... will break down your calls by prospects, appointments, and more. Find out if your marketing dollars are going to waste when callers sit on hold and never get a fair chance to do business with you.

related_products.short_desc: Priority management solution that helps businesses access projects, allocate tasks, share files, create reports, and more.
related_products.features: PRIORITY MATRIX is a powerful, intuitive, and easy to use software suite that helps individuals be more effective at managing their priorities using proven time management methodologies. For individuals, Priority Matrix provides a platform  to prioritize tasks and projects to work more effectively. For teams, Priority Matrix provides a means to communicate team priorities, delegate work, track progress, and ultimately, provide more visibility and accountability.

related_products.short_desc: Business budgeting software that provides a company with the financial and operational information it needs to make better decisions.
related_products.features: Elevate your budgeting, planning, and modeling with enterprise planning software. Familiar Excel-like sheets streamline the planning process and allow you to drill down into cell values in order to extract and share strategic insights. Configurable options and the ability to create custom calculations within your model give you the flexibility to adapt as your business grows and changes. Workday Adaptive Planning is positioned as a Leader in Gartner's 2019 Magic Quadrant for Cloud FP&A Solutions

similar_products.short_desc: Manual processes impacting execution? Leading organizations trust AchieveIt to connect, manage, and execute key plans and initiatives
similar_products.features:
Tired of manually collecting progress updates & managing siloed data across various plans & initiatives? Are these manual processes impeding your visibility and impacting execution?

Business leaders trust AchieveIt to connect, manage, & execute their most important plans and initiatives - improving visibility, increasing accountability, and driving collaboration.

That's why leading organizations across industries trust AchieveIt for their business performance management.

similar_products.short_desc: Bizview allows access to near real-time data from ERP systems and the ability to create reports without relying on IT.
similar_products.features: Bizview allows access to near real-time data from your ERP system or any other data source, as well as the ability to create your own reports without relying on IT. Handle everything from basic financial statements to multi-company reporting with operational consolidation and currency management. Bizview can also combine data from multiple sources, and its visualization tools allow you to create dashboards of defined goals, enabling teams to see and understand your organization's performance.

similar_products.short_desc: Intelligent CPM platform that aligns strategic financial and operational planning, budgeting, forecasting, and complex reporting.
similar_products.features: OneStream is a market-leading modernized CPM solution that unifies and simplifies financial consolidation, planning, reporting, analytics, and financial data quality. Modernize financial processes, replace multiple legacy applications, and reduce the total cost of ownership of financial systems. Allow your team to spend less time on data integration and system maintenance and more time on driving business performance. Learn more about OneStream Software.

similar_products.short_desc: Easily manage strategic planning and strategy execution in one place.
similar_products.features:
Strategypoint is a simple, flexible, and customizable strategy management platform. It embraces the fundamental elements of all popular strategy management best practices, and let's you easily configure them in the way that works best for you and your team.

Start with your existing strategic plan, or use a Strategypoint plan template. Cascade the plan to everyone in your organization with linked objectives and work plans, and routinely monitor success.

Achieve your vision with Strategypoint!

similar_products.short_desc: Cube's business performance management software automatically syncs data from your tech stack to your spreadsheets.
similar_products.features: Cube is the business performance management software that automatically syncs source data from your tech stack to your spreadsheets. Optimize your business performance management workflows in Excel and Google Sheets by reducing manual data transfers and the risk of human error. Finance professionals who use Cube can tell the story behind the numbers faster than ever. Cube pairs the flexibility and familiarity of your spreadsheet with the control and scale of performance software.

similar_products.short_desc: Board helps you discover crucial insights and unify strategy, finance, and operations to take full control of performance.
similar_products.features: Board's Intelligent Planning platform empowers you to discover crucial insights which drive business outcomes and unify strategy, finance, and operations to plan smarter, make better decisions, and take full control of performance. Trusted by over 2,000 leading enterprises worldwide, Board has 25 offices and a global partner network.

similar_products.short_desc: Spider Impact is business performance management software that bridges the gap between strategic planning and execution.
similar_products.features:
Spider Impact is business performance management software that bridges the gap between strategy and execution. It highlights the operational data you need to run your organization, while never losing sight of your big-picture goals. With Spider Impact you can:

1. Create and customize strategy maps/strategy-on-a-page
2. Cascade your strategy to all employees for strategic alignment 
3. Track KPIs & visualize strategic performance in real-time
4. Create interactive executive briefings in minutes

similar_products.short_desc: We are a Business Performance Software provider of demand planning, forecasting, and inventory optimization solutions.
similar_products.features: Smart Software offers Smart IP&O, an integrated set of Business Performance Management applications for demand planning, inventory optimization, and supply chain analytics. It provides a single, easy to use, easy to scale, easy to collaborate, environment with robust inventory and forecast modeling. Our implement one, implemented for all approach means you can address a discrete set of needs initially and add new apps when ready without additional implementation costs.

similar_products.short_desc:
Everything you need to manage contracts, clients, proposals, contracts, payments, and more. 

Use code "ONLY1" to start for $1/mo.
similar_products.features:
Business performance management for independent professionals-that's HoneyBook.

HoneyBook makes it easy to book more clients, manage projects, and get paid all in one place.

With proposals, invoices, contracts, payments, and scheduling at your fingertips, you have everything you need to give clients a great experience.

Get your first 6 months for just $1/mo with code "ONLY1".

similar_products.short_desc: Flomatika is a Value Stream Management platform focused on faster and more predictable value delivery.
similar_products.features:
Flomatika provides near end-to-end visibility into product delivery flow, helping you to understand how your delivery ecosystem is performing to more effectively govern and steer.

The platform provides actionable insights and surfaces hidden constraints which hinder the ability to improve speed, increase quality and optimise value.

similar_products.short_desc: Jedox is the world's most adaptable planning and performance management platform for integrated business planning.
similar_products.features: Jedox is the world's most adaptable planning and performance management platform that empowers organizations to deliver plans that outperform expectations. From FP&A to broader integrated business planning, model any scenario, integrate data from any source and simplify cross-organizational plans across all business systems. Jedox enables a culture of decisiveness and confidence so teams can plan for opportunities, react quickly to changes, and uncover what they didn't know was possible.

similar_products.short_desc: Corporater Enterprise Performance Management (EPM) Suite is a software that can be configured for a wide variety of performance models.
similar_products.features: Corporater Enterprise Performance Management (EPM) Suite integrates KPIs and dashboards with how customers run their business through measuring, managing, and driving performance. Corporater can be configured for a wide variety of performance management models. Corporater helps customers tell the whole performance story, where decisions are supported by analytics, and can be placed into execution through actions and projects. Suitable for medium and large organizations.

similar_products.short_desc: StaffCircle uniquely combines performance management & employee engagement into one cloud platform that measurably improves culture.
similar_products.features: StaffCircle is performance & culture platform enabling companies achieve a better performance management across the organisation. We believe that performance management is intrinsically linked to employee engagement, so we designed our cloud-based platform to do both. Our flexible performance management gives a 360 view of each and every employee and fully automates every stage of the process. Combining this with multi-channel engagement & communication features.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Budgeting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Budgeting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Budgeting software automates the coordination of an organization's financial resources and expenditures. Budgeting solutions allow for timely and accurate data management and analysis in order to give an overall picture of a business' growth and profitability. Multiple users across various departments can contribute their projected expenses and revenues to the organization's budgeting system, providing an automated budget approval process. Budgeting software is related to Accounting software, Business Performance Management software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Intelligence software enables companies to access, analyze and share information in order to improve decision-making through gathering performance metrics. By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Decision Support software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Decision Support tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Decision Support software facilitates the decision-making process by helping to prioritize objectives, evaluate alternatives and simulate results. Functionality within this type of software includes data visualization, decision trees, decision tables and scorecards. Decision Support software is related to Business Intelligence software, and Business Performance Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Financial Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Financial Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Financial Reporting software automates the task of reporting an organization's financial results, status and transactions. Financial Reporting applications help organizations control and increase operational efficiencies. These solutions provide the ability to collect, translate and consolidate data from various systems and geographic locations. Financial Reporting software is related to Accounting software, Budgeting software, Business Performance Management software and Compliance software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reporting software applications allow real-time access to essential data as well as the rapid generation of multidimensional reports from diverse data sources. Among many other uses, Reporting software can generate financial statements, track the success of sales strategies, monitor responsiveness to regulatory compliance concerns and manage internal controls or security audits. Reporting software is related to Business Intelligence software and Survey software.

pricing_plans.name: Connect
pricing_plans.description: The Connect plan is free of cost.

pricing_plans.name: Recognize
pricing_plans.description: The Recognize plan does not charge any startup fees and comes with free implementation support.

pricing_plans.name: Lead
pricing_plans.description: The Lead plan is charged per person and comes with free implementation support.

pricing_plans.name: Listen
pricing_plans.description: The Listen plan does not charge any support or startup fees.

_source.short_desc: Motivosity is an employee recognition platform where employees can recognize each other, add a dollar, and cash out for rewards.
_source.long_desc: We are changing the game of employee recognition! With adding our new ThanksMattters Card to our platform, we'll have your employees carrying around company gratitude in their pocket. With that, we are a modern employee engagement software with the mission to make people happier at work. Our platform focuses on three of the top drivers of employee satisfaction: feeling appreciated for your work, being part of a community, and having a meaningful relationship with your manager. #thanksmatters
_source.pricing_details:
Motivosity's four products work together to create the full suite your company needs for employee engagement, or perfectly on their own. With zero startup costs or integration fees, no matter what product you are using.

Connect       FREE
Recognize   $4 per user per month
Lead             $5 per user per month
Listen           $2 per user per month

With bundle and volume discounts available.

category_features.name: Peer-to-Peer Recognition
category_features.definition: Allows employees to praise one another in a social network-like feed visible to the whole organization.

category_features.name: Recognition Tracking
category_features.definition: Track accrued recognition and rewards at an individual employee level

category_features.name: Anonymous Feedback
category_features.definition: Allow reviewers to provide anonymous feedback to encourage honest conversations

category_features.name: Continuous Feedback
category_features.definition: Provide ongoing performance feedback to employees on a regular basis, rather than giving feedback at designated times

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: View statistics and metrics about a document on a dashboard or by exporting a file

category_features.name: Progress Tracking
category_features.definition: Reporting on how each task or process has advanced since its initiation

category_features.name: Question Library
category_features.definition: Prepopulate common question/answer options

category_features.name: Rater Selection
category_features.definition: Select specific number and type of reviewers to provide feedback for an individual/participant (e.g. peers, supervisors, etc.)

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Surveys & Feedback
category_features.definition: Gauge satisfaction and receive information for improvement and success

category_features.name: Employee Portal
category_features.definition: Online gateway through which employees can access and track their own information and metrics

category_features.name: Gamification
category_features.definition: Games or game-like elements to track progress and reward accomplishments

category_features.name: Benchmarking
category_features.definition: Compare key metrics for the business against prominent players in the industry

category_features.name: Employee Recognition
category_features.definition: Acknowledge and reward employees for reaching specific goals and/or for exemplary performance.

category_features.name: Goal Management
category_features.definition: Allows employees to set and manage work or career related goals.

category_features.name: Negative Feedback Management
category_features.definition: Identify, track, and respond to negative feedback

category_features.name: Performance Management
category_features.definition: Organize and manage the accomplishments and development of employees

category_features.name: Pulse Surveys
category_features.definition: Surveys sent out at regularly scheduled intervals to track important metrics like job satisfaction, work environment, etc.

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: 360 Degree Feedback
category_features.definition: A process in which an employee receives feedback and a full analysis of how their peers, managers, and direct reports perceive them.

category_features.name: Compensation Management
category_features.definition: Organize and track payroll, bonuses, and additional company benefits and perks distributed to each employee

category_features.name: Customizable Templates
category_features.definition: Create, save, and re-purpose formatting

category_features.name: Customization
category_features.definition: Customize the levels of performance/achievement (i.e. numeric or alphabetic)

category_features.name: Individual Development Plans
category_features.definition: Document completed by employee to assist with career and personal development to reach short term and long term goals

category_features.name: On-going Performance Tracking
category_features.definition: Organize real time feedback and assessments on employees' skills and accomplishments to determine promotions or performance plans

category_features.name: Peer Appraisals
category_features.definition: Peer/teammate feedback and review on individual's performance

category_features.name: Review Cycle Tracking
category_features.definition: Follow the progression of a task associated with performance reviews

category_features.name: Self Assessment
category_features.definition: An individual's evaluation of his or her own strengths, weaknesses, and skills

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Skills Assessment
category_features.definition: Observe employees over a period of time to gain an understanding of their abilities to perform certain tasks

category_features.name: Weighted Performance Measures
category_features.definition: Assess skills, outcomes and results using preset metrics and averages

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: Identify patterns in assembled data

category_features.name: Data Analysis Tools
category_features.definition: Analyze survey results via statistical testing or crosstabs directly within the software

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Mobile Survey
category_features.definition: Distribute a survey via mobile devices

category_features.name: Offline Response Collection
category_features.definition: Allow participants to fill out and submit the survey without internet connection

category_features.name: Question Branching
category_features.definition: Show participants specific questions based on their answer to a previous question (ie. different paths)

category_features.name: Question Library
category_features.definition: Prepopulate common question/answer options

category_features.name: Site Intercept Survey
category_features.definition: Survey popup over a webpage to specific users based on their behavior

category_features.name: Skip Logic
category_features.definition: Avoid showing participants irrelevant questions as determined by the answer to a previous question

category_features.name: Support Audio/Images/Video
category_features.definition: Allow media to be embedded in the question or answer options

category_features.name: URL Customization
category_features.definition: Change the URL of your survey to fit your branding or survey title

related_products.short_desc: The only employee recognition and engagement platform that integrates with Amazon to provide rewarding, simple, flexible recognition.
related_products.features: Everything you love about Amazon is now available for rewards, recognition, and incentives. Awardco has partnered with Amazon Business to bring millions of reward choices, lower vendor fees and dollar-for-dollar recognition spend to your organization. More choice, more capability, and less spend - all in one simple platform. Minimum company size of 100 employees.

related_products.short_desc: Bonusly is the recognition, engagement, and rewards platform employees love. It practically runs itself, so you'll love it, too.
related_products.features: Bonusly is the fun and easy way to recognize all of your employees. Designed for both users and admins, Bonusly features peer-to-peer recognition that's connected to company values, automated celebrations for new hires, birthdays, and work anniversaries, customizable awards, flexible survey tools, and an international reward catalog with gift card, donation, and swag options. 87% of Bonusly users participate in the program every month, generating actionable people analytics you can trust.

related_products.short_desc: Guusto helps HR Leaders at companies with 200+ employees to recognize great work and shape amazing culture. #1 HIGHEST RATED ON G2!
related_products.features:
Guusto helps HR Leaders at companies with 200+ employees to recognize great work and shape amazing culture.

#1 HIGHEST RATED on Capterra & G2!  

NO POINTS that lack transparency, value and impact. No minimums, markups or hidden fees, and full credit back on unclaimed rewards. 

FLEXIBLE REDEMPTION so people choose something they actually want.

PURPOSE-DRIVEN with one day of clean water donated for every gift sent.

FREE ACCOUNT to get started sending rewards in minutes, not months!

related_products.short_desc: Kudos? partners mid-sized and enterprise clients worldwide across all industries.
related_products.features: Kudos? is an employee engagement, culture, and analytics platform, that harnesses the power of peer-to-peer recognition, values reinforcement, and open communication to help organizations boost employee engagement, reduce turnover, improve culture, and drive productivity and performance.

related_products.short_desc: Create group cards perfect for employee birthdays, work anniversaries, and other special occasions.  Popular with remote teams!
related_products.features:
Use Kudoboard's group cards for workplace appreciation on special occasions, shout outs, and company events. Perfect to celebrate staff birthdays, work anniversaries, onboarding, farewells, retirement, and more. 

Using the product is easy - simply create a board, add content including messages, pictures, videos, and GIFs, and then invite others to sign.

related_products.short_desc: WebHR is everyone's favorite and a global leader in Cloud HR - Helps you manage the most important asset in your company - your People!
related_products.features: WebHR is revolutionizing the way HR works. WebHR is a Social all-in-one Cloud based HR Software for Small & Medium Enterprises that handles everything from Hire to Retire, in the most innovate way. WebHR not only saves money to the companies, but also boosts productivity, saves space and make inter and intra-office communications fast, reliable and more efficient. WebHR assists in managing a companys most important asset - its People.

related_products.short_desc: Nectar is a people platform that bundles social recognition, rewards & swag management to promote core values & improve culture.
related_products.features: Nectar helps you create a culture people won't want to leave through consistent, meaningful peer-to-peer recognition & rewards. Build a sense of community, evangelize core values and connect people to each other and the mission of your company. 94% of our customers have seen an increase in employee engagement. Break down the barriers of remote work, boost morale and help people feel valued for their contribution everyday. No implementation fees or long contracts (month to month).

related_products.short_desc: Tango Card bundles simple technology, great rewards, and expert service to help companies get the most out of their reward programs.
related_products.features: Tango Card provides leading incentive-delivery technology to organizations in the B2B space. Globally, enterprise companies use this technology to deliver an extensive catalog of domestic and global e-gift cards as part of consumer loyalty programs, sales incentive programs, health and wellness engagement, and employee recognition. Tango Card believes instantly delivering the most desirable rewards maximizes impact and drives real business results.

related_products.short_desc: Fond is a global SaaS platform that seamlessly consolidates employee rewards and recognition processes into one easy-to-use solution.
related_products.features:
Fond is a global SaaS platform that seamlessly consolidates employee rewards and recognition processes into one easy-to-use solution. With Fond, employees and managers can recognize each other, redeem rewards, access exclusive corporate discounts, and measure success so HR departments spend less time managing programs and more time driving results. 

Fond is headquartered in San Francisco, California.

related_products.short_desc: It's never been easier to make your team feel appreciated and stay connected!
related_products.features:
Do you want to lead a passionate team that feels empowered by their work? 

To experience a sense of camaraderie with their co-workers and the company as a whole? Then Spinify is perfect for you! We make it easy for managers to recognize their staff and take steps to establish a positive culture. Using gamification, competitions, notifications, and more - Spinify makes it simple for companies to maintain an engaging workplace culture, where everyone feels valued!

similar_products.short_desc: Nectar is a people platform that bundles social recognition, rewards & swag management to promote core values & improve culture.
similar_products.features: Nectar helps you create a culture people won't want to leave through consistent, meaningful peer-to-peer recognition & rewards. Build a sense of community, evangelize core values and connect people to each other and the mission of your company. 94% of our customers have seen an increase in employee engagement. Break down the barriers of remote work, boost morale and help people feel valued for their contribution everyday. No implementation fees or long contracts (month to month).

similar_products.short_desc: Reward Gateway's employee engagement platform brings strategic recognition, communications, employee surveys, and discounts together.
similar_products.features:
Reward Gateway helps clients increase employee engagement and drive business results through a tailored platform that combines employee recognition, communications, surveys, discounts and analytics in one unified hub. 

Our Client Success Team partners with you to create fully branded solutions aligned to your employee engagement goals, and to reflect your unique mission, culture and employer brand to drive the highest levels of platform usage.

similar_products.short_desc: Bucketlist Rewards is a leading employee recognition tool where employees earn points for high performance that they can redeem later t
similar_products.features: Bucketlist is an employee recognition, rewards, and incentive program that employees love to use. Bucketlist personalizes recognition to match the individual needs of the employee. With Bucketlist employees can earn points and redeem them to achieve life goals. Bucketlist is a powerful tool that results in higher employee engagement and lower voluntary turnover and is perfect for mid to large size companies (100 - 5,000 employees). Learn more at bucketlistrewards.com and schedule a demo now!

similar_products.short_desc: Kazoo combines Goals & OKRs, Recognition, Feedback, Conversations, and Incentives within a single, easy-to-use platform.
similar_products.features: The Kazoo Employee Experience Platform brings together everything you need to create a high-performing, connected culture regardless of where your employees work or what device they use. By combining Goals & OKRs, Recognition, Feedback, Conversations, and Incentives within a single, easy-to-use platform, your employees become more engaged, your managers become better leaders, and your productivity and business performance soars.

similar_products.short_desc: The only employee recognition and engagement platform that integrates with Amazon to provide rewarding, simple, flexible recognition.
similar_products.features: Everything you love about Amazon is now available for rewards, recognition, and incentives. Awardco has partnered with Amazon Business to bring millions of reward choices, lower vendor fees and dollar-for-dollar recognition spend to your organization. More choice, more capability, and less spend - all in one simple platform. Minimum company size of 100 employees.

similar_products.short_desc: Bonusly is the recognition, engagement, and rewards platform employees love. It practically runs itself, so you'll love it, too.
similar_products.features: Bonusly is the fun and easy way to recognize all of your employees. Designed for both users and admins, Bonusly features peer-to-peer recognition that's connected to company values, automated celebrations for new hires, birthdays, and work anniversaries, customizable awards, flexible survey tools, and an international reward catalog with gift card, donation, and swag options. 87% of Bonusly users participate in the program every month, generating actionable people analytics you can trust.

similar_products.short_desc: Reinforce the moments that matter. Make recognition a part of your company culture with Empuls employee recognition platform.
similar_products.features: Make recognition democratic, frequent and continuous with Empuls employee recognition platform. Use platform features like comments, tags, hi-fives, claps to bring more engagement. Whether it's a job well done, welcoming a new team member aboard or a work anniversary - do it all from anywhere with Empuls. 1000+ organizations across the globe trust Empuls to recognize & reward their employees seamlessly.

similar_products.short_desc: Fond is a global SaaS platform that seamlessly consolidates employee rewards and recognition processes into one easy-to-use solution.
similar_products.features:
Fond is a global SaaS platform that seamlessly consolidates employee rewards and recognition processes into one easy-to-use solution. With Fond, employees and managers can recognize each other, redeem rewards, access exclusive corporate discounts, and measure success so HR departments spend less time managing programs and more time driving results. 

Fond is headquartered in San Francisco, California.

similar_products.short_desc: Welcome to the most complete collection of employee recognition tools for celebrating daily wins and team triumphs for large companies.
similar_products.features:
Crafted specifically for large-scale employee recognition programs, and ideal for enterprise and global workforces. Give and receive recognition with Culture Cloud. Culture Cloud Recognition helps every employee appreciate great work to make playing on a winning team a way of life.

From career milestones to everyday expressions of gratitude, Culture Cloud Recognition offers enterprise clients the widest variety of tools for crafting diverse employee experiences that engage and inspire.

similar_products.short_desc: Peer award and recognition software for teams.
similar_products.features: Accolader is a free peer award system. It focuses on awards, not rewards. Accolader is built on what works to increase happiness and engagement, rather than rewards, which don't. A focus has been placed on simplicity, in both administration and usage.

similar_products.short_desc: Employee recognition software designed specifically to automate the distribution of digital gift cards to employees at scale.
similar_products.features: WeGift allows companies to recognize employees by easily distributing digital gift cards to employees at scale. With the WeGift API, you can connect directly to the world's largest network of digital incentives. Save money on your customer loyalty programs by accessing industry-leading discounts on gift cards. Choose gift cards from major brands in any currency. View real-time data to glean insights from your reports. Easily use gift cards to make your employees feel more recognized.

similar_products.short_desc: Kudos? partners mid-sized and enterprise clients worldwide across all industries.
similar_products.features: Kudos? is an employee engagement, culture, and analytics platform, that harnesses the power of peer-to-peer recognition, values reinforcement, and open communication to help organizations boost employee engagement, reduce turnover, improve culture, and drive productivity and performance.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Community software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Community tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Community software allows businesses to connect with their customers by creating a space for sharing ideas, collecting opinions, storing Q&A data, and interacting with fellow customers and business representatives.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Performance Appraisal tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Performance Management software automates the process of reviewing employee performance, setting new objectives, and writing individual development plans. A type of Performance Management solution is 360 degree feedback software, which manages the process in which an employee completes a self-evaluation and is also evaluated by their manager, peers, and direct reports. Performance Management software is related to 360 Degree Feedback software, Human Resource software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Talent Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Talent Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Talent Management software gives employers the tools to accurately manage, evaluate, and compensate based on employee performance. By tracking performance and standards, Talent Management software allows companies to create and maintain a high-performance workforce. Key features of this type of software include employee learning, compensation evaluations, policy compliance, and succession planning, all of which help companies manage personnel growth. Directories related to Talent Management software are Human Resource software, Performance Appraisal software, Succession Planning software, Training software, Workforce Management software, and Applicant Tracking software.

pricing_plans.name: Recognize
pricing_plans.description: The Recognize plan does not charge any startup fees and comes with free implementation support.

pricing_plans.name: Lead
pricing_plans.description: The Lead plan is charged per person and comes with free implementation support.

pricing_plans.description: The Listen plan does not charge any support or startup fees.
